title: Coronation Street spoilers: Gemma and Chesney get engaged after she gives birth to quads
text:
It’s been a tough couple of months for Gemma Winter (Dolly-Rose Campbell) and Chesney Brown (Sam Aston) in Coronation Street, which is why Chesney came up with a plan to take Gemma away from the cobbles for a little while during tonight’s episode. With plans to propose to his girlfriend, the pair set off to Llandudno, but disaster struck when Gemma went into labour high-up in a cable-car!

With Bernie’s (Jane Hazelgrove) interview having painted Chesney like a love rat, the paparazzi lined up outside his front door during tonight’s episode — hoping to grab a few snaps of the local celebrity. It’s safe to say that Gemma couldn’t have been more frustrated as a result, and — what with the blinds and curtains drawn — she felt trapped in her own home.

As Gemma and Bernie reminisced about day’s gone by, Chesney devised a plan to cheer his girlfriend up — and said plan was later enacted with help from Fiz (Jennie McAlpine), as Bernie acted a decoy to distract the photographers, so that Gemma and Chesney could slip out the back.

Having successfully managed to escape, Gemma and Chesney headed to Llandudno, and — upon arriving — they took a ride in a cable car. With a beautiful backdrop on offer, Chesney decided to seize the opportunity and propose. Gemma was seemingly elated, but disaster struck when she went to grab the ring — and it went flying out of the cable car and into the bushes below.

However, that was the least of their problems as Gemma later went into labour while in the cable car, and — not knowing what to do for the best — Chesney pulled the emergency brake, much to Gemma’s dismay — as they were now stranded up in the air.

With the paramedics on their way, Gemma delivered one of the babies in the cable car, before successfully being transported to the hospital.

Afterwards — in the hospital — Bernie handed Chesney the ring — which she’d managed to locate.

As Gemma and Chesney stared at their new babies, Gemma agreed to marry Chesney, and he removed the ring from his pocket — much to her delight — and successfully put it on her finger.

They embraced — ready for their new future together.

Coronation Street continues Thursday 31stOctober at 8:30pm on ITV.
